definitions: The perception of beauty is subjective and varies from person to person.
What one person finds beautiful or admirable may not be the same for another.
examples: I think that painting is hideous, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
He loves his old, rusty car; I guess beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
lemma: beauty is in the eye of the beholder
synonyms: there is no accounting for taste
source: beauty is in the eye of the beholder
